name: The Infinite Cat
description:
The Infinite Cat is an endless runner game. Run and jump on generated platforms. Collect diamonds to increase your final score. The game includes a scoreboard (top 10). Fight with your friends for as many points as possible!

Controls:

Mouse click/Space - jump.

Double mouse click/Double Space - double jump.

Known problems:

Problem with mute button in WebGL version. In the Windows version, everything works correctly.

Have questions about the game/license?

Send me an email at: shadowxpl.games@gmail.com
